item.title: Video Autoplay and Time Skipping
item.description: Recently, I have been tasked to maintain one of the projects that provide a video player service powered by a powerful library videojs which claims to be the most popular open-source HTML5 player framework, according to its site. The previous engineers working before me had contributed a tremendous work by creating a customised version of our own player which provides functionalities, such as time markers, etc. It worked perfectly. Until I was asked to implement three new functionalities onto the video player:
